title.value: Clinical Implementation of the egs_brachy Graphical User Interface for Low-Dose-Rate Prostate and Breast Brachytherapy
title.justification: The purpose and conclusions of the paper focus on the clinical implementation of the egs_brachy graphical user interface for LDR brachytherapy.
title.quote: Purpose: To clinically implement the egs_brachy graphical user interface (eb_gui) for low-dose-rate (LDR) prostate and breast brachytherapy...

extractions.description: The paper discusses the clinical implementation and validation of the egs_brachy graphical user interface for low-dose-rate (LDR) brachytherapy in prostate and breast cancer, comparing Monte Carlo simulations to treatment planning system calculations.

type.justification: The research involves clinical implementation and testing, comparing simulation results with existing treatment planning systems, which indicates an empirical approach.
type.quote: A clinical implementation of the eb_gui workflow along with various test cases for LDR breast and prostate were developed...

name.justification: The primary research field is focused on the clinical implementation of brachytherapy techniques.
name.quote: ...clinical implementation of the egs_brachy graphical user interface for LDR prostate and breast brachytherapy...

name.justification: Monte Carlo simulations are used extensively for dose calculation and comparison with traditional methods.
name.quote: ...two MC simulations were performed using eb_gui: (i) TG43MC (water phantom, no interseed attenuation), and (ii) TG186MC (realistic tissue assignment with interseed attenuation)...

name.justification: The model discussed and implemented in the paper is the egs_brachy graphical user interface (eb_gui).
name.quote: Purpose: To clinically implement the egs_brachy graphical user interface (eb_gui) for low-dose-rate (LDR) prostate and breast brachytherapy...

is_contributed.justification: The paper discusses the development and clinical implementation of this tool.
is_contributed.quote: A clinical implementation of the eb_gui workflow along with various test cases for LDR breast and prostate were developed.

is_executed.justification: The egs_brachy GUI is executed for simulations comparing with treatment planning systems.
is_executed.quote: For each case, two MC simulations were performed using eb_gui...

is_compared.justification: The outputs from the egs_brachy GUI are compared with traditional treatment planning systems.
is_compared.quote: Dose differences between TPS and TG43MC doses were less than 0.2 Gy...

referenced_paper_title.quote: A clinical implementation of the eb_gui workflow along with various test cases for LDR breast and prostate were developed.
